title: Video: Blaue Blume – In Disco Lights
content:
This is awesome on so many levels.

First of all, Blaue Blume’s In Disco Lights is perhaps the best song of the year. Come end of year lists, this is going to be in my top ten, I know it already. Secondly, this video has a straight up classic 90’s feel to it, I’m half expecting Damon Albarn to prance into the picture. Hell. Enough of my rambling, check it out below.
author: 5e9b68b27a1236eccfeb1d27
